Newbie Helper:
Did you forgot your mission? Go find the Blue Gemstones. You must defeat the Gremlins to obtain Blue Gemstones.
Attack the Gremlins like I explained estilete. Move your cursor over a Gremlin and click the left mouse button. This will transform the cursor into the shape of a knife. Click the left mouse button again attack.
Before attacking, use "Battle Cry". Your attack will be stronger. Press the key F2 to activate Battle Cry, and press the F2 key again to turn of Battle Cry.

Do this and you shall be well-rewarded. Good luck!
